summary: Completed testing of two key fixes: (1) About Us page 'Powered by Modern Technology' section removal and (2) SharedMatchCard consistent styling for sent/received cards. Backend APIs fully functional, frontend fixes verified.

ui_bugs.issue: Direct navigation to /messages loses session and redirects to login

passed_tests: Backend API health check (100% success rate - 17/17 tests)
Homepage loads correctly with match cards
About Us page 'Powered by Modern Technology' section successfully removed
About Us page 'Built with React, FastAPI, and MongoDB' text successfully removed
About Us page ends with 'By the Numbers' section as expected
SharedMatchCard consistent styling verified in code (isMine conditional removed)
Mobile responsive design (no horizontal overflow at 390px)
User authentication indicators working (Level 0, user icon displayed)
